operationBinding.selectClause: o.organization_id, o.parrent_organization_id, o.organization_name, o.ident_code, o.chief, o.remark, o.work_hours, o.found_date, o.important, o.super_priority, o.status, str.street_name||' '||a.full_address as real_address_descr
operationBinding.tableClause: organizations o, addresses a, streets str
operationBinding.whereClause: o.physical_address_id = a.addr_id(+) and a.street_id = str.street_id(+) and o.parrent_organization_id = $criteria.organization_id order by o.priority

operationBinding.tableClause: ccare.main_services ms, ccare.main_orgs mo, ccare.business_org bo
operationBinding.whereClause: ms.organization_id = mo.organization_id AND ms.organization_id = bo.organization_id AND bo.business_detail_id = 59 AND ms.main_master_id = 0 AND ms.service_id = 3 #if($criteria.organization_id) AND ms.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end
t.business_detail_id = d.business_detail_id and d.deleted = 0 and t.deleted = 0 and t.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id

operationBinding.whereClause: start with tt.main_master_id = 0 connect by prior tt.organization_id = tt.main_master_id order siblings by tt.priority

operationBinding.customSQL:
select distinct * from ( select ms.organization_id, ms.main_master_id, mo1.organization_name, mo1.identcode, mo1.director, mo1.legaladdress, ms.deleted, mo1.note, mo1.workinghours, mo1.founded, mo1.mail, mo1.org_info, mo1.webaddress, mo1.contactperson, mo1.dayoffs, mo1.workpersoncountity, mo1.ind, mo1.organization_name_eng, mo1.new_identcode, mo1.legal_statuse_id, mo1.statuse, str.street_name_geo||' '||ma.address_suffix_geo as real_address_descr, c.city_name_geo, getDistrict(str.street_id) as city_region_name_geo, str.street_location_geo, getindex(str.street_id) as index_text, mo1.note_crit, ls.legal_statuse, c.city_id, ms.priority, mo1.extra_priority, ma.street_id, ma.address_suffix_geo, ma.addr_block, ma.addr_appt, ma.addr_descr, ma.addr_number from ccare.main_services ms, ccare.main_orgs mo1, main_address ma, streets str, cities c, legal_statuses ls where mo1.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ma.organization_id=ms.organization_id and str.street_id = ma.street_id and c.city_id = str.city_id and ls.legal_statuse_id = mo1.legal_statuse_id and ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 #if($criteria.organization_id) and ms.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end #if($criteria.organization_name1) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name2) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name3) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name4) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name4)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name5) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name5)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name6) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name6)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name7) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name7)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name8) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name8)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name9) and mo1.organization_name||' '||mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.organization_name9)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note1) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note2) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note3) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note4) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note4)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note5) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note5)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note6) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note6)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note7) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note7)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note8) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note8)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note9) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note9)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note10) and mo1.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name10)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name_eng) and mo1.organization_name_eng like ($criteria.organization_name_eng)||'%' #end #if($criteria.legaladdress) and mo1.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress)||'%' #end #if($criteria.note) and mo1.note like '%'||($criteria.note)||'%' #end #if($criteria.director1) and mo1.director like '%'||($criteria.director1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.director2) and mo1.director like '%'||($criteria.director2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.director3) and mo1.director like '%'||($criteria.director3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.dayoffs1) and mo1.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.dayoffs2) and mo1.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.dayoffs3) and mo1.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.address_suffix_geo) and ma.address_suffix_geo like '%'||($criteria.address_suffix_geo)||'%' #end #if($criteria.real_address_descr) and str.street_name_geo like '%'||($criteria.real_address_descr)||'%' #end #if($criteria.workinghours) and mo1.workinghours like '%'||($criteria.workinghours)||'%' #end #if($criteria.webaddress) and mo1.webaddress like '%'||($criteria.webaddress)||'%' #end #if($criteria.mail) and mo1.mail like '%'||($criteria.mail)||'%' #end #if($criteria.legal_statuse_id) and mo1.legal_statuse_id = $criteria.legal_statuse_id #end #if($criteria.identcode) and mo1.identcode = $criteria.identcode #end #if($criteria.ind) and mo1.ind = $criteria.ind #end #if($criteria.main_master_id) and ms.main_master_id = $criteria.main_master_id #end #if($criteria.street_id) and ma.street_id = $criteria.street_id #end #if($criteria.city_id) and ma.city_id = $criteria.city_id #end #if($criteria.ident_code) and (mo1.identcode like '%'||($criteria.ident_code)||'%' or mo1.new_identcode like '%'||($criteria.ident_code)||'%' ) #end #if($criteria.city_region_id) and exists (select * from ccare.street_district tt where tt.street_id = str.street_id and tt.city_region_id = $criteria.city_region_id) #end
) tt connect by prior tt.organization_id = tt.main_master_id order siblings by tt.priority

operationBinding.selectClause: distinct o.organization_id, o.parrent_organization_id, o.organization_name, o.ident_code, o.chief, o.remark, o.work_hours, o.found_date, o.email_address, o.additional_info, o.web_address, o.contact_person, o.day_offs, getdaysdescription(o.day_offs) as day_offs_descr, o.staff_count, o.organization_index, o.organization_name_eng, o.ident_code, o.legal_form_desc_id, getdaysdescription(o.legal_form_desc_id) as legal_form_desc, o.status, a.street_id, decode(a.hidden_by_request,1,'მისამართი დაფარულია',tw.town_name || ', ' ||getDistrict(str.street_id)||', '||str.street_name||' '||a.full_address) as real_address_descr, tw.town_name, getDistrict(str.street_id) as town_district, str.street_location, getindex(str.street_id) as street_index_text, o.important, tw.town_id, o.priority, 0.super_priority, a.town_district_id, decode(a.hidden_by_request,1,'მისამართი დაფარულია',(tw.town_name||' / '|| getDistrict(str.street_id)||' / '||str.street_name||' '||a.full_address)) as full_address, getTbilisiOrder(tw.town_id) as cust_order, /*getStreetOldNames(str.street_id) as street_old_name,*/ str.street_name, a.hidden_by_request, decode(o.parrent_organization_id,null,null,'home') as tree_org_parrent, decode((select min(1) from organizations ms1 where ms1.parrent_organization_id = o.organization_id),null,null,'associations') as tree_org_child, a.full_address, a.block, a.appt, a.descr, a.anumber, o.super_priority, /*getStreetIdxs(str.street_id) as street_indexes,*/ (tw.town_name||' / '|| getDistrict(str.street_id)||' / '||str.street_name||' '||a.full_address) as full_address_not_hidden, getorgbusiness_alerts(o.organization_id) as org_allert_by_buss_det, o.legal_address_id, o.physical_address_id
operationBinding.tableClause: organizations o, addresses a, streets str, towns tw
operationBinding.whereClause: o.physical_address_id = a.addr_id(+) and str.street_id = a.street_id and tw.town_id = a.town_id #if($criteria.parrent_organization_id) and o.parrent_organization_id = $criteria.parrent_organization_id #end #if($criteria.organization_id) and o.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end #if($criteria.pp_organization_id) and o.organization_id = $criteria.pp_organization_id #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name1) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name2) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name3) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name4) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name4)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name5) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name5)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name6) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name6)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name7) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name7)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name8) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name8)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name9) and o.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name9)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark1) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark2) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark3) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark4) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark4)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark5) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark5)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark6) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark6)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark7) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark7)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark8) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark8)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark9) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark9)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark10) and o.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.real_address1) and str.street_name like '%'||($criteria.real_address1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.real_address2) and str.street_name like '%'||($criteria.real_address2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.real_address3) and str.street_name like '%'||($criteria.real_address3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.real_address4) and str.street_name like '%'||($criteria.real_address4)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.real_address5) and str.street_name like '%'||($criteria.real_address5)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.organization_name_eng) and o.organization_name_eng like ($criteria.organization_name_eng)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress) and o.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress1) and o.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress2) and o.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress3) and o.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress4) and o.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress4)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legaladdress5) and mo1.legaladdress like '%'||($criteria.legaladdress5)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.remark) and mo1.remark like '%'||($criteria.remark)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.director1) and mo1.director like '%'||($criteria.director1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.director2) and o.director like '%'||($criteria.director2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.director3) and o.director like '%'||($criteria.director3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.dayoffs1) and o.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs1)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.dayoffs2) and o.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs2)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.dayoffs3) and o.dayoffs like '%'||($criteria.dayoffs3)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.address_suffix_geo) and ma.address_suffix_geo like '%'||($criteria.address_suffix_geo)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.workinghours) and o.workinghours like '%'||($criteria.workinghours)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.webaddress) and o.webaddress like '%'||($criteria.webaddress)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.mail) and o.mail like '%'||($criteria.mail)||'%' #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.legal_statuse_id) and o.legal_statuse_id = $criteria.legal_statuse_id #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.identcode) and o.identcode = $criteria.identcode #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.ind) and o.ind = $criteria.ind #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.street_id) and ma.street_id = $criteria.street_id #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.city_id) and ma.city_id = $criteria.city_id #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.ident_code) and (o.identcode = $criteria.ident_code or o.new_identcode = $criteria.ident_code ) #end #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.city_region_id) and exists (select * from ccare.street_district tt where tt.street_id = str.street_id and tt.city_region_id = $criteria.city_region_id) #end

operationBinding.customSQL: select tt.*,ms.service_id from ( select t.lastname ||' , '|| t.firstname as fullName, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფარულია',t.city_name_geo) as city_name_geo, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფარულია',t.streetName) as streetName, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფ.', decode(t.phone_state_id,6,'მხს.',t.phone)) as phone, t.mainID, t.hide, 'აბონ.' as orgOrAbonent, t.phoneStatusID, -1000 as statuse, -1000 as extra_priority, -1000 as note_crit, t.phone_status, t.contact_phones, 1 as is_abonent from SEARCHIND t where 1 = 1 and t.phone = $criteria.phone union all select t.lastName ||' , '|| t.firstname as fullName, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფარულია',t.city_name_geo) as city_name_geo, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფარულია',t.streetName) as streetName, decode(t.hide,1,'დაფ.', decode(t.phone_state_id,6,'მხს.',t.phone)) as phone, t.mainID, t.hide, 'ორგ.' as orgOrAbonent, t.phoneStatusID, t.statuse, t.extrapriority as extra_priority, t.note_crit, t.phone_status, t.contact_phones, 0 as is_abonent from searchOrg t where t.phone = $criteria.phone ) tt inner join ccare.main_services ms on ms.organization_id = tt.mainID order by tt.fullname

select ms.organization_id, ms.main_master_id, mo1.organization_name, mo1.identcode, mo1.director, mo1.legaladdress, ms.deleted, mo1.note, mo1.workinghours, mo1.founded, mo1.mail, mo1.org_info, mo1.webaddress, mo1.contactperson, mo1.dayoffs, mo1.workpersoncountity, mo1.ind, mo1.organization_name_eng, mo1.new_identcode, mo1.legal_statuse_id, mo1.statuse, str.street_name_geo||' '||ma.address_suffix_geo as real_address, c.city_name_geo, getDistrict(str.street_id) as city_region_name_geo, str.street_location_geo, getindex(str.street_id) as index_text, mo1.note_crit, ls.legal_statuse, c.city_id, ms.priority, mo1.extra_priority, ma.street_id, ma.address_suffix_geo, ma.addr_block, ma.addr_appt, ma.addr_descr, ma.addr_number, ccare.getorgbusiness_alerts(ms.organization_id) as org_allert_by_buss_det from ccare.main_services ms, ccare.main_orgs mo1, main_address ma, streets str, cities c, legal_statuses ls where mo1.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ma.organization_id=ms.organization_id and str.street_id(+) = ma.street_id and c.city_id(+) = ma.city_id and ls.legal_statuse_id(+) = mo1.legal_statuse_id and ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 #if($criteria.organization_id) and ms.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end

select tt.organization_id from (select t.organization_id, t.main_master_id from ccare.main_services t start with t.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id connect by prior t.main_master_id = t.organization_id) tt where tt.main_master_id = 0

operationBinding.selectClause: level,case when level = 1 then tmp.organization_name when level = 2 then '...' || tmp.organization_name when level = 3 then '.........' || tmp.organization_name when level = 4 then '...............' || tmp.organization_name when level = 5 then '.....................' || tmp.organization_name when level = 6 then '...........................' || tmp.organization_name when level = 7 then '.................................' || tmp.organization_name else tmp.organization_name end as organization_name_tree, tmp.*
operationBinding.tableClause: (SELECT distinct ms.organization_id, ms.main_master_id, mo1.organization_name, mo1.identcode, mo1.director, mo1.legaladdress, ms.deleted, mo1.note, mo1.workinghours, mo1.founded, mo1.mail, mo1.org_info, mo1.webaddress, mo1.contactperson, mo1.dayoffs, mo1.workpersoncountity, mo1.ind, mo1.organization_name_eng, mo1.new_identcode, mo1.legal_statuse_id, mo1.statuse, decode(ma.address_hide, 1, 'მისამართი დაფარულია', c.city_name_geo || ', ' || getDistrict(str.street_id) || ', ' || str.street_name_geo || ' ' || ma.address_suffix_geo) as real_address, c.city_name_geo, getDistrict(str.street_id) as city_region_name_geo, str.street_location_geo, getindex(str.street_id) as index_text, mo1.note_crit, ls.legal_statuse, c.city_id, ms.priority, mo1.extra_priority, ma.city_region_id, ma.street_id, p.partnerbank, p.organization_id as p_bank_organization_id, decode(ma.address_hide, 1, 'მისამართი დაფარულია', (c.city_name_geo || ' / ' || getDistrict(str.street_id) || ' / ' || str.street_name_geo || ' ' || ma.address_suffix_geo)) as full_address, ccare.getTbilisiOrder(c.city_id) as cust_order, ccare.getStreetOldNames(str.street_id) as street_old_name, str.street_name_geo, ma.address_hide, decode(ms.main_master_id, 0, null, 'home') as tree_org_parrent, decode((select min(1) from ccare.main_services ms1 where ms1.main_master_id = ms.organization_id and ms1.deleted = 0), null, null, 'associations') as tree_org_child, ma.address_suffix_geo, ma.addr_block, ma.addr_appt, ma.addr_descr, ma.addr_number FROM ccare.main_services ms, ccare.main_orgs mo1, main_address ma, streets str, cities c, legal_statuses ls, org_partnerbank_lists p WHERE mo1.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ma.organization_id=ms.organization_id and str.street_id = ma.street_id and mo1.partnerbank_id = p.organization_id(+) and c.city_id = ma.city_id and mo1.legal_statuse_id = ls.legal_statuse_id(+) and ms.service_id = 3 mo1.organization_name like '%'||($criteria.organization_name10)||'%' #end #if($criteria.organization_name_eng) and mo1.organization_name_eng like ($criteria.organization_name_eng)||'%' #end operationBinding.customSQL: select ms.organization_id, ms.main_master_id, mo1.organization_name, mo1.identcode, mo1.director, mo1.legaladdress, ms.deleted, mo1.note, mo1.workinghours, mo1.founded, mo1.mail, mo1.org_info, mo1.webaddress, mo1.contactperson, mo1.dayoffs, mo1.workpersoncountity, mo1.ind, mo1.organization_name_eng, mo1.new_identcode, mo1.legal_statuse_id, mo1.statuse, decode(ma.address_hide, 1, 'მისამართი დაფარულია', c.city_name_geo || ', ' || getDistrict(str.street_id) || ', ' || str.street_name_geo || ' ' || ma.address_suffix_geo) as real_address, c.city_name_geo, getDistrict(str.street_id) as city_region_name_geo, str.street_location_geo, getindex(str.street_id) as index_text, mo1.note_crit, ls.legal_statuse, c.city_id, ms.priority, mo1.extra_priority, ma.city_region_id, ma.street_id, p.partnerbank, p.organization_id as p_bank_organization_id, decode(ma.address_hide, 1, 'მისამართი დაფარულია', (c.city_name_geo || ' / ' || getDistrict(str.street_id) || ' / ' || str.street_name_geo || ' ' || ma.address_suffix_geo)) as full_address, ccare.getTbilisiOrder(c.city_id) as cust_order, ccare.getStreetOldNames(str.street_id) as street_old_name, str.street_name_geo, ma.address_hide, decode(ms.main_master_id, 0, null, 'home') as tree_org_parrent, decode((select min(1) from ccare.main_services ms1 where ms1.main_master_id = ms.organization_id and ms1.deleted = 0), null, null, 'associations') as tree_org_child, ma.address_suffix_geo, ma.addr_block, ma.addr_appt, ma.addr_descr, ma.addr_number, getStreetIdxs(str.street_id) as street_indexes, (c.city_name_geo||' / '|| getDistrict(str.street_id)||' / '||str.street_name_geo||' '||ma.address_suffix_geo) as full_address_not_hidden from ccare.main_services ms, ccare.main_orgs mo1, main_address ma, streets str, cities c, legal_statuses ls , org_partnerbank_lists_new p where ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 and ms.organization_id = mo1.organization_id and ma.organization_id = ms.organization_id and ma.deleted = 0 and ma.street_id = str.street_id(+) and ma.city_id = c.city_id(+) and mo1.legal_statuse_id = ls.legal_statuse_id(+) and mo1.partnerbank_id = p.organization_id(+) #if(!$criteria.main_master_id && $criteria.pp_organization_id) start with ms.organization_id = $criteria.pp_organization_id connect by prior ms.organization_id = ms.main_master_id order siblings by ccare.getTbilisiOrder(c.city_id), mo1.extra_priority , ms.priority #elseif($criteria.main_master_id) and ms.main_master_id = $criteria.main_master_id #end

operationBinding.whereClause: ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 and ms.organization_id = mo.organization_id and ($defaultWhereClause)

ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 and ms.organization_id = mo.organization_id #if($criteria.organization_id) and ms.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id and mo.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end #if($criteria.organization_name) and mo.organization_name like $criteria.organization_name||'%' #end

ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 and ms.organization_id = mo.organization_id #if($criteria.organization_id) and ms.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id and mo.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id #end #if($criteria.organization_name) and mo.organization_name like '%'||$criteria.organization_name||'%' #end

operationBinding.customSQL: select distinct mo.organization_name, md.main_detail_geo, p.phone, ccare.isPhoneMobile(substr(p.phone,1,3)) as phone_type, ms.organization_id, ms.main_master_id, ms.priority, md.fields_order from ccare.main_orgs mo inner join ccare.main_services ms on ms.organization_id = mo.organization_id inner join ccare.main_details md on md.organization_id = mo.organization_id inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_detail_id = md.main_detail_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where mo.organization_id in (select t.organization_id from ccare.main_services t start with t.organization_id = $criteria.organization_id and t.service_id = 3 and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.organization_id = t.main_master_id) and md.main_detail_type_id in (5, 30, 59, 60, 61) and p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and md.deleted = 0 and p.phone is not null and p.phone not like '8%' and length(p.phone)>4 and ms.service_id = 3 and ms.deleted = 0 order by ms.main_master_id, ms.organization_id, ms.priority, md.fields_order
